summary.span: 類別可讓您建置 DMSL 要求裝載 (例如 、 或 )。

span.span: The class enables you to build a DSML request payload, such as , , or .

summary.span: 使用者可以先新增、刪除、修改和列舉 ，再傳送至伺服器。

summary.span: 可以與任何 DSML 繫結類別搭配使用來傳輸文件 (例如 )。

span.span: can be used with any DSML Binding classes to transport the document, such as .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
protected: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 屬性包含用來同步存取 的物件。

span.span: The property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的、 直接依據。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object.
